name: Marvel: Avengers Alliance 2
description:
Marvel: Avengers Alliance 2 is a strategy game developed by Marvel Entertainment. It was originally released in 2016. Marvel Entertainment published the game.
Marvel: Avengers Alliance 2 is available on iOS and Android.
Julia Fredrickson, Justin Woods and Tony Sherrill produced the game. It was directed by Bill Rosemann, Chia Chin Lee, Michael Rubinelli and Robert Reichner.
